-  GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/leaderboardSetReleases 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/leaderboardSetReleases

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-leaderboardSetReleases#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/leaderboardSetReleases
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-leaderboardSetReleases#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-leaderboardSetReleases#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterDetails-_id_-relationships-leaderboardSetReleases#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterDetailLeaderboardSetReleasesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterdetailleaderboardsetreleaseslinkagesresponse)`OK`
